Title: Prohibits supply chain surcharges on consumer goods or services
Summary: Prohibits supply chain surcharges on consumer goods or services; requires the display price for any good or service to include all costs associated with such good or service including but not limited to taxes and fees.
LawCode: Add ยง390-d, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting supply chain surcharges on consumer goods or services
